post: I could add: the most troublesome points of congruence between the SOT and the NT writings I can think of, when it comes to replicating the NT scenario, would be the time period spent in the shroud following death. There doesn’t seem to be any good reasons for keeping the victim’s corpse in an expensive shroud over such a short time that happens to coincide with scripture..
